texts.name: Sinara
texts.biography: Sinara has a heart of gold, and a voice that is said to make the flower and rainbow dragons dance on the winds. They protect her as if she were their greatest treasure.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Flower Dragons or Rainbow Dragons or each level attained after 2th level.
specialty.tooltip:
{Flower Dragons}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Flower Dragons or Rainbow Dragons.
specialty.name: Flower Dragons
